metadata.name: Welcome NFT
metadata.description: Welcome to the world of Calligraphy Art NFT, where tradition meets innovation. This NFT is drawn by calligrapher and artist Kanan Sumiyoshi, creating a unique art that combines calligraphy, art, and kawaii culture. It is a one-of-a-kind art that embodies the beauty of Japanese brush strokes. This NFT is a gateway to the new world of NFT art. Please enjoy the world of Calligraphy Art NFT!
